channel.title: DC21 on The Official DEF CON Networking Team
channel.description: Recent content in DC21 on The Official DEF CON Networking Team

item.title: DEFCONSecure Taken Down
item.description: DEFCONSecure has been shutdown due to 802.1x vulnerabilities. There is no known ETA for restoration at this time.

item.title: Current Bandwidth Report
item.description: Not bad, guys. We expect to see this number possibly double though throughout the next couple of days…

item.title: Updated Attack Counts
item.description: As of 15:45, the updated attack counts are:

item.title: We're Watching You Better Than the NSA
item.description: It’s been an interesting morning, for sure. The CON has just begun and we’re already seeing the attacks begin: You guys just don’t give up. ;)

item.title: And So It Begins
